MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in   L25 postcode area of Liverpool,  affecting properties in Malton Road and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:16PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 1:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:20PM on 1st March 2021
